GSD.description:
powerpc/fixmap: Fix VM debug warning on unmap

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.24 by commit 43ae0ccc4d2722b833fb59b905af129428e06d03. For more details please see the references link.
